section.title: Installing the Cloud Controller
section.para: Install the messaging queue server, RabbitMQ.
You have the option of installing Apache Qpid, refer to the Compute Administration Manual for configuration instructions, including adding rpc_backend=nova.rpc.impl_qpid to your nova.conf.
section.screen: sudo yum install openstack-utils memcached qpid-cpp-server
section.para: Install the required nova- packages, and dependencies are automatically installed.
section.screen: sudo apt-get install nova-compute nova-volume nova-vncproxy nova-api nova-ajax-console-proxy nova-cert nova-consoleauth nova-doc nova-scheduler nova-network
